histogram.name: Privacy.AboutThisSite.PageLoadValidation
histogram.summary: Whether AboutThisSite had a valid proto. Recorded when optimization hints are available on pageload.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccessContextAudit.CookieDomainCount
histogram.summary: The number of unique cookie domains for which accesses has been recorded for in the Access Context Audit database. Logged on initialization of the Access Context Audit DB on 1% of starts.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccessContextAudit.DatabaseSize
histogram.summary: Size of the Access Context Audit database file in KiB. Determined by directly inspecting the database file. Logged on initialization of the Access Context Audit DB on 1% of starts.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccessContextAudit.RecordCount
histogram.summary: The total number of access records stored in the Access Context Audit database. Logged on initialization of the Acceess Context Audit DB on 1% of starts.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccessContextAudit.StorageOriginCount
histogram.summary: The number of unique origins associated with origin keyed storage APIs recorded in the Access Context Audit database. Logged on initialization of the Access Context Audit DB on 1% of starts.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccessContextAudit.TopFrameOriginCount
histogram.summary: The number of unique top frame origins for which access to storage APIs has been recorded in the Access Context Audit database. Logged on initialization of the Acceess Context Audit DB on 1% of starts.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccuracyTip.AccuracyTipInteraction
histogram.summary: The interaction performed on the accuracy tip UI. Recorded when UI is closed.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccuracyTip.AccuracyTipTimeOpen
histogram.summary: The amount of time the accuracy tip UI was shown. Recorded when UI is closed.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccuracyTip.NumDialogsShown
histogram.summary: The number of accuracy tip dialogs that have been shown to the user. Recorded when UI is closed.

histogram.name: Privacy.AccuracyTip.PageStatus
histogram.summary: The accuracy status of a page. Recorded on each page load.

histogram.name: Privacy.ClearOnExitSyncEvent
histogram.summary: Interactions between sync and the cookies clear on exit setting. Only recorded when the user has cookies clear on exit enabled.

histogram.name: Privacy.ConsentAuditor.ConsentGiven.Feature
histogram.summary: Logged each time the user grants a consent for a feature integrated with the consent auditor. The value indicates which feature.

histogram.name: Privacy.ConsentAuditor.ConsentNotGiven.Feature
histogram.summary: Logged each time the user denies or revokes a consent for a feature integrated with the consent auditor. The value indicates which feature.

histogram.name: Privacy.CookieControlsSetting
histogram.summary: Whether third-party cookies are blocked in incognito mode or completely. Recorded at the Profile startup. In case that "Block all cookies" is selected in settings, this metric records BlockThirdParty.

histogram.name: Privacy.CookiesInUseDialog.Action
histogram.summary: Logging actions done by the user while interacting with the "Cookies in use" dialog.

histogram.name: Privacy.DIPS.BounceCategory{DIPSRedirectType}{DIPSCookieMode}
histogram.summary: Whether a {DIPSRedirectType} redirect accessed cookies and whether its origin previously had user engagement. Recorded when redirecting between different sites, {DIPSCookieMode}.

histogram.name: Privacy.DIPS.CookieAccessFilterResult{DIPSCookieMode}
histogram.summary: The return value of CookieAccessFilter::Filter(). Recorded once per navigation, {DIPSCookieMode}.

histogram.name: Privacy.DIPS.TimeFromInteractionToStorage{DIPSCookieMode}
histogram.summary: The amount of time after a user interacts with a site until the site persists state (e.g. cookies), {DIPSCookieMode} (where site = eTLD+1). Not recorded if state is written before interaction takes place (see analogous histogram below).

histogram.name: Privacy.DIPS.TimeFromNavigationCommitToClientBounce
histogram.summary: The amount of time after a navigation to a site commits until a renderer initiated navigation (without user activation) is started to a different site. Not recorded if the redirecting site does not access state (e.g. cookies) or takes longer than 10 seconds to initiate the redirect (bounce).

histogram.name: Privacy.DIPS.TimeFromStorageToInteraction{DIPSCookieMode}
histogram.summary: The amount of time after a site persists state (e.g. cookies) until the user interacts with the site, {DIPSCookieMode} (where site = eTLD+1). Not recorded if interaction takes place before state is written (see analogous histogram above).

histogram.name: Privacy.DoNotTrackSetting
histogram.summary: Whether the Do Not Track setting is enabled. Recorded at the Profile startup.

histogram.name: Privacy.ThirdPartyCookieBlockingEnabledForSite
histogram.summary: Records whether third party cookie blocking was enabled for a site on page load. Only recorded for users who enabled the cookie controls ui.

histogram.name: Privacy.ThirdPartyCookieBlockingSetting
histogram.summary:
Whether the third party cookie blocking setting is enabled. Recorded at the Profile startup.
Previously recorded as the "ThirdPartyCookieBlockingEnabled" and "ThirdPartyCookieBlockingDisabled" actions.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.KeyFetcher.HttpResponseOrNetErrorCode
histogram.summary: Error info for fetching public keys from the processing server. Recorded for each fetch request. The HTTP response code is recorded if there is no net error code for the request.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.KeyFetcher.Status
histogram.summary: Records the high level status of each key network fetch request.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.KeyFetcher.Status2
histogram.summary: Records the high level status of each key network fetch request.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.ReportAssembler.Status
histogram.summary: Records the high level status of each aggregatable report assembly request. Recorded for reports requested from any API (e.g. Attribution Reporting API).

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.ReportSender.HttpResponseOrNetErrorCode
histogram.summary: Error info for sending an aggregatable report to a reporting endpoint, recorded for every aggregatable report sent. The HTTP response code is recorded if there is no net error code for the request.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.ReportSender.Status
histogram.summary:
Records the high level request status for each aggregatable report being sent to a reporting endpoint. Recorded for reports requested from any API (e.g. Attribution Reporting API).
Recorded for every aggregatable report sent. It might retry in case of failure but only the final status will be counted for each report.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.ReportStatus
histogram.summary:
Records the high level request status of each aggregatable report. These reports are requested by APIs that rely on private, secure aggregation (e.g. Attribution Reporting API).
Recorded for every aggregatable report sent. It might retry in case of failure but only the final status will be counted for each report.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.Storage.Sql.CreationTime
histogram.obsolete: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.Storage.Sql.CreationTime2 which only records when Threadticks is supported, 10/2022.
histogram.summary: Records the time it took to initialize a new aggregation service database from scratch. Recorded when the aggregation service database finishes initialization. Note that 0 is recorded if `ThreadTicks` is not supported.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.Storage.Sql.CreationTime2
histogram.summary: Records the time it took to initialize a new aggregation service database from scratch. Recorded when the aggregation service database finishes initialization. Note that no event is recorded if `ThreadTicks` is not supported.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.Storage.Sql.InitStatus
histogram.summary: Records initialization statuses of AggregationServiceStorageSql. Note: currently AggregationServiceStorageSql is initialized lazily.

histogram.name: PrivacySandbox.AggregationService.Storage.Sql.StoreRequestHasCapacity
histogram.summary: Records whether there was sufficient capacity to store the request, i.e. that the per-reporting origin limit had not been reached. Recorded for each StoreRequest attempt.
